title: Placement Cell
overview: The Placement Cell at St. Francis de Sales College serves as a bridge between students and potential employers, facilitating career opportunities and professional growth.
objectives: To provide training and guidance for students to enhance their employability skills.
To organize campus recruitment drives and connect students with reputable organizations.
To offer career counseling and support for higher education pursuits.
activities: Workshops and seminars on resume building, interview skills, and corporate etiquette.
Industry interactions and guest lectures to provide insights into various career paths.
Internship opportunities to gain practical experience in relevant fields.
